name: Player
text: W-Woah! Who are you? And an even better question, WHAT are you?

name: Eva
text: My name is Eva, I am the princess of the mirror world.

name: Eva
text: I see you are not aware of the mirror world. Allow me to inform you.

name: Eva
text: The mirror world is… a replica of your world, except everyone is the opposite of their world counterpart. Good becomes evil, and evil becomes good.

name: Player
text: Alright... why are you telling me this?

name: Eva
text: I have a request to make...

name: Eva
text: The mirror world and your world are in… great danger…

name: Eva
text: A threat that our kind is not strong enough for…

name: Eva
text: It's a boy, named Void… He has killed many of our kind, but also yours…

name: Eva
text: He was part of an organization known as the Resistance (MWR), a powerful group known for having many wars with our kind. Void was the strongest soldier out of all of them...

name: Eva
text: We managed to capture him and well... it worked, but... the powerful effects of our world were a little strong...

name: Eva
text: He became a psychotic beast, not only killing many of my kind, but also yours.

name: Eva
text: We're theorizing that if someone defeats him, or beats the darkness out of him, he may return to normal, so both worlds can hopefully live in harmony.

name: Player
text: How can I even do that on my own.

name: Eva
text: I will assist you in combat. I will put all my faith into you.

name: Eva
text: There's your very first enemy you can train on!

name: Eva
text: Take it down, and continue your journey!

name: Eva
text: I-I'll just be safe in your shadow

name: Player
text: I… take back what I said.

name: Eva
text: He'll come back, make sure to find him again!

name: Void
text: I'm no beast, I'm an angel! CAN'T YOU SEE?!

name: Void
text: I'm the ultimate angel of DEATH!

name: Eva
text: He's corrupted! [Player], get ready! I'll assist you!

name: Eva
text: He should be weaker, but not weak enough… [Player]! We can finish him next time. Here, take t-

name: Player
text: No no! I can't continue without you! You've taught me everything!

name: Eva
text: Please... Make sure to knock whatever is in him out... Something inside him has grown stronger because of this world, that is why he is hostile.

name: Eva
text: All I ask of y-you... is to contain... your anger... and keep him alive... he can be of great value...

name: Void
text: Sad because of your little compion?!

name: Player
text: I will end you. For her.

name: Void
text: I don't remember anything. The last thing I remember is… that I was here… before passing out…

name: Void
text: I could see a dark figure... it was talking to me, but I did not understand what it said...

name: Player
text: You have been corrupted by the dangers of this world. You have KILLED my FUCKING companion.

name: Void
text: I-I don't understand… Why don't I remember any of this..?

name: Player
text: Eva told me. Something within this world has triggered some being inside of you.

name: Player
text: Where do you think you're going?!

name: Void
text: I-I think it's better if I… disappear…

name: Player
text: You came back to your senses, it only felt right.

name: Void
text: I can still see that undeniable anger in you.

name: Void
text: If you want to kill me, it's fine. I have nothing to live for anyways.

name: Void
text: I would be happier if you did.

name: Player
text: I can't. I don't want to…

name: Player
text: I'm not someone who kills... I know you have murdered Eva but that was something that was out of your control, so revenge isn't.. really an option.

name: Player
text: It doesn't feel right to kill you, you're in such a horrible condition already, only hurting yourself more by… abusing these substances…

name: Void
text: I have no other place to go, besides, I'm dead in the papers, might as well just wait the actual event out.

name: Void
text: What else is there to life?

name: Void
text: I'm worth absolutely nothing. I have lived as an outcast my entire life.

name: Void
text: Do you know what it feels like to be judged on what species you are? Do you know the pain of having to know you're different?

name: Void
text: DO YOU KNOW HOW IT FEELS TO FIGHT FOR YOUR OWN LIFE EVERYY SINGLE DAY!?

name: Void
text: It was nice having you around for these couple minutes.

name: Void
text: Though I really have to go now, if you know what I mean.

name: Void
text: It's just not worth it for me anymore. I have lost everyone I cared about. My family, my friends in the Resistance, my caretaker...

name: Void
text: All because I'm half a demonic being... along with that... thing... within me.
*he makes a slashing motion towards his neck*

name: Player
text: DON'T YOU VALUE ANYTHING IN YOUR LIFE?

name: Player
text: Please… stay with me… it's okay… I will take care of you, I promise. No one will hurt nor leave you ever again…

name: Player
text: I promise you that no one will ever judge you on what you are, and that your sins will be forgiven.

name: Player
text: I know it will be hard to believe coming from the person who attacked, and almost killed you, but... give me a chance...

name: Player
text: I know, and it hurts me. But like I said, it was something out of your control. And that part of you is gone now.

name: Player
text: I don't want to feel the guilt of leaving you behind, especially when you're like this.

name: Player
text: Please, take my hand you cutie, I'll try my best.

name: Player
text: Let us find a way for you to be accepted, together.
